sources.title: Thunderground (1989) Jesse Ventura | From the streets to the ring: A fight for survival
sources.description:
Con artist Casey teams up with hardened drifter Bird, seeing him as her ticket to a better life. Together, they journey to New Orleans to arrange a high-stakes, no-rules match against "The Man," the enigmatic king of bare-knuckle boxing, where victory means survival.

Original title: Thunderground (1989) 
Alternative title: Boxcar Blues / Thunderground: Busted Up 2

Director: David Mitchell
Writers: David Mitchell, Damian Lee

Main cast:
Paul Coufos - Bird
Margaret Langrick - Casey
Jesse Ventura - The Man
William Sanderson - Ratman
Pete Dempster - Rhubarb
Michael Copeman - Cody
Michael Scherer - Jimbo
Donny Lalonde - Minister
Warren Van Evera - Red Rider
M. Emmet Walsh - Wedge

Genres: Action, Adventure
Release date: September 1, 1989
Filming locations: Toronto, Ontario, Canada


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: A con-artist meets a tough fighter and sees him as her ticket to a better life. The two make an agreement and head off to New Orleans to arrange a match with "the man" - the mysterious king of bare-knuckled boxing. There are no rules for this fight...one man wins when the other dies.
metadata.Actors: Paul Coufos, Ric Sarabia, Margaret Langrick
